subject: test protected method outside package
msgSnippet: Hi, Does any one know how I can test protected method outside a package? Without moving the test class into the package where the method to be tested resides.
messageBody:
Hi,



Does any one know how I can test protected method outside a package? Without
moving the test class into the package where the method to be tested
resides.



Method to be tested = methodA()

Package = org.apache.net



Test Method = testMethodA()

Package = org.apache.net.test.unit





Thanks,

-Kamal.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
